As a Data Scientist with a solid foundation in industrial engineering and a proven track record at OneMagnify, I specialize in creating and maintaining data pipelines, dashboards, and reporting solutions that drive significant business improvements. My approach is characterized by a relentless pursuit of excellence, continuous learning, and a commitment to contributing innovative solutions within data science teams.
